gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Combined NSSL and GTRI Lightning Mapping Array Data
Combined NSSL and GTRI Lightning Mapping Array Data

gmd:deliveryPoint.gco:CharacterString: Atmospheric Science Group, Department of Geosciences, Texas Tech University, Box 41053

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Lightning Mapping Array (LMA) sensors were deployed at pre-designated locations for each IOP for the LEE Field Project time period and area of interest. The array consisted of up to 8 GTRI sensors (Units N-X), 8 NSSL sensors (Sites 1-8) and 1 TTU sensor. The network was operated by Georgia Tech Research Institute, National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration / Office of Atmospheric Research / National Severe Storms Laboratory and OU / CIWRO staff with invaluable assistance from SUNY Oswego faculty and students. This data set includes Level 1 (VHF sources) files. Raw station files (Level 0) uploaded separately. All sensor locations were centered around surrounding the New York Tug Hill Plateau. See the readme file for more information.

gmd:name.gco:CharacterString: TAR: Unix Tape ARchive (TAR) Format File (application/x-tar)
